resources.string: User name does not exist, please check if the user name is correct.
The account has been locked. Please try again later.
Incorrect password. You have entered the wrong password %s times in a row, and your account will be locked when the number of errors reaches %s. Please check your password and try again!
The account has been locked. Unlock time: %s. Please try again later.
The service is not registered, please contact the developer!
